sentences.english: Add balsam pear, saute with medium heat until done, serve.
sentences.chinese: 最后加入苦瓜，以中火再炒拌至所有材料熟透即可。

sentences.english: The beef was underdone and quite uneatable.
sentences.chinese: 这牛肉未熟透，简直不能吃。

sentences.english: Deep-fry chicken wings in hot oil until golden yellow and done.
sentences.chinese: 将鸡翼放入热油中炸至金黄熟透。

sentences.english: Pan - fry kebabs in 2 tbsp oil until golden yellow and done . set aside.
sentences.chinese: 用2汤匙油将串烧煎至金黄熟透，取起待用。

sentences.english: Fry beef tenderloin in wok over medium heat until well done.
sentences.chinese: 将牛柳落镬，用中火煎至熟透。

sentences.english: Heat 3 tbsps oil in wok, saute giblets until cooked. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 烧3汤匙油，爆炒肾片至熟透，取起。

sentences.english: Pan-fry chicken steaks in 2 tbsp oil until done.
sentences.chinese: 用2汤匙油将鸡扒煎至金黄熟透，上碟。

sentences.english: The wheat will shell after a few days.
sentences.chinese: 麦子已熟透，再过几天就会脱落了。

sentences.english: Withered and yellow is squashy orange just was picked on the tree that orange is yellow.
sentences.chinese: 枯黄的是树上刚摘下来熟透的桔子那桔黄。

sentences.english: He picked out the ripest peaches.
sentences.chinese: 他把熟透的桃子挑出来。

sentences.english: An almond tart, stuffed with the sweet, ripe fruit.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁挞，里头塞满了熟透的甜蜜水果。

sentences.english: Plums and apples thoroughly ripe do fall.
sentences.chinese: 熟透的李子和苹果自然会坠落。

sentences.english: I could smell the honeyed ripeness of melons and peaches.
sentences.chinese: 我能闻到瓜桃熟透了的香甜味道。

sentences.english: In 35 miles, we'll have hard-boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 行驶到35英里，鸡蛋就熟透了。

sentences.english: Add beans and cook until just heated through, then season with sea salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入蚕豆一起煸炒到熟透，用盐和胡椒调味。

definition: (of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
